CustomField.description: This field is for admin use only to store detailed information about the job, such as the associated Jira ticket, owner, intended use, and other relevant notes. Use this field to document critical context for job management and auditing. Ensure entries are clear and concise to facilitate tracking and collaboration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is for admin use only to store detailed information about the job, such as the associated Jira ticket, owner, intended use, and other relevant notes. Use this field to document critical context for job management and auditing. Ensure entries are clear and concise to facilitate tracking and collaboration.
CustomField.label: Admin Notes
